entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:17 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
